name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程的目的: 熟悉各種轉換器電路的原理, 學習轉換器電路設計實務, 學習電子電路製作, 實驗驗證轉換器的功能。
schedule:
1.  Introduction, 分組
2.  Introduction of laboratory equipment
3.  Lab 1: AC-DC converter, Bridge rectifier
4.  Lab 2: Boost DC-DC converter Design, Circuit schematic
5.  Circuit board layout and Manufacturing (Lab2測驗)
6.  Experiments
7.  No class
8. Lab 4: Flyback DC-DC converter
9. Mid-Exam week
10. Experiments (Lab4測驗)
11. Lab 5: Boost DC-DC converter with PFC
12. Experiments, (Lab5測驗)
13. Introduction of Arduino
14. Lab 6: Full-bridge DC-DC converter
15. Experiments, (Lab 6測驗)
16. Lab 7: Full-bridge DC-AC inverter
17. Experiments
18. Final exam. week
scorePolicy:
實驗 (上課時檢查)：40%
實驗報告：20%
Exam：40% (5次測驗)
materials:
上課講義: 北科i學園
Reference: "Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華
